1 //Namespace
  2 var EarthServerGenericClient = EarthServerGenericClient || {};
  3 
  4 /**
  5  * Generic Server Response Data object. All requests store the response in an instance of this object.
  6  * One instance can be given as parameter for different requests if all requests writes different fields.
  7  * Example: One WMS request for the texture and one WCS request for the heightmap.
  8  * @constructor
  9  */
 10 EarthServerGenericClient.ServerResponseData = function () {
 11     this.heightmap = null;          //Heightmap
 12     this.heightmapUrl = "";         //If available, you can use the link as alternative.
 13     this.texture = new Image();     //Texture as image object
 14     this.texture.crossOrigin = '';  //Enable Texture to be edited (for alpha values for example)
 15     this.textureUrl = "";           //If available, you can use the link as alternative.
 16     this.width = 0;                 //Heightmap width
 17     this.height = 0;                //Heightmap height
 18     //The information about the heightmap are used to position a module correctly in the fishtank.
 19     //The minimum value as offset and the difference between minimum and maximum for scaling.
 20     this.minHMvalue =  Number.MAX_VALUE;//Lowest value in the heightmap
 21     this.maxHMvalue = -Number.MAX_VALUE;//Highest value in the heigtmap
 22     this.averageHMvalue = 0;        //Average value of the heightmap
 23 
 24     this.validate = function()
 25     {
 26         //Texture
 27         if( this.texture === undefined){    return false;   }
 28         if( this.texture.width <= 0 || this.texture.height <=0){    return false;   }
 29 
 30         //Heightmap
 31         if( this.heightmap === null){    return false;   }
 32         if( this.width === null || this.height === null){    return false;   }
 33         if( this.minHMvalue === Number.MAX_VALUE || this.maxHMvalue === -Number.MAX_VALUE){    return false;   }
 34 
 35         //Everything OK
 36         return true;
 37     };
 38 };
 39 
 40 /**
 41  * Small helper to synchronise multiple request callbacks. After all callbacks to this helper
 42  * are received the ResponseData object with all response data is send to the module.
 43  * After each request is received a progress update is send to the module.
 44  * @param callback - Module which requests the data.
 45  * @param numberToCombine - Number of callbacks that shall be received.
 46  */
 47 EarthServerGenericClient.combinedCallBack = function(callback,numberToCombine)
 48 {
 49     var counter = 0;
 50     this.name = "Combined Callback: " + callback.name;
 51     EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("Combine: " + callback.name);
 52 
 53     this.receiveData = function(data)
 54     {
 55         counter++;
 56         if( counter ==  numberToCombine)
 57         {
 58             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Combine: " + callback.name);
 59             callback.receiveData(data);
 60         }
 61     }
 62 
 63 };
 64 
 65 /**
 66  * Requests a WMS image, stores it in the responseData and make the callback once it is loaded.
 67  * @param callback - Object to do the callback.
 68  * @param responseData - Instance of the ServerResponseData.
 69  * @param WMSurl - URL of the WMS service.
 70  * @param WMScoverID - Coverage/Layer ID.
 71  * @param WMSCRS - The Coordinate Reference System. (Should be like: "crs=1")
 72  * @param WMSImageFormat - The image format that should be returned.
 73  * @param BoundingBox - The bounding box of the image.
 74  * @param WMSVersion - WMS Version that should be used.
 75  * @param width - Width of the response image.
 76  * @param height - Height of the response image.
 77  */
 78 EarthServerGenericClient.getCoverageWMS = function(callback,responseData,WMSurl,WMScoverID,WMSCRS,WMSImageFormat,BoundingBox,WMSVersion,width,height)
 79 {
 80     responseData.textureUrl = WMSurl + "?service=WMS&version=" + WMSVersion +"&request=Getmap&layers=" + WMScoverID;
 81     responseData.textureUrl += "&" + WMSCRS + "&format=image/" + WMSImageFormat;
 82     responseData.textureUrl += "&bbox=" + BoundingBox.minLatitude + "," + BoundingBox.minLongitude + ","+ BoundingBox.maxLatitude + "," + BoundingBox.maxLongitude;
 83     responseData.textureUrl += "&width="+width+"&height="+height;
 84 
 85     responseData.texture.onload = function()
 86     {
 87         callback.receiveData(responseData);
 88     };
 89     responseData.texture.onerror = function()
 90     {
 91         x3dom.debug.logInfo("Could not load Image.");
 92         callback.receiveData(responseData);
 93     };
 94     responseData.texture.src = responseData.textureUrl;
 95 
 96 };
 97 
 98 /**
 99  * Starts a WCPS query and stores the received image in the responseData.
100  * If a dem is encoded in the alpha channel it will be extracted and also stored. Set DemInAlpha Flag in this case.
101  * @param callback - Object to do the callback.
102  * @param responseData - Instance of the ServerResponseData.
103  * @param url - URL of the WCPS service.
104  * @param query - The WCPS query.
105  * @param DemInAlpha - Flag if a dem is encoded in the alpha channel.
106  */
107 EarthServerGenericClient.getWCPSImage = function(callback,responseData,url, query, DemInAlpha)
108 {
109     EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("WCPS: " + callback.name);
110     try
111     {
112         responseData.texture.onload = function()
113         {
114             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("WCPS: " + callback.name);
115             if(DemInAlpha)
116             {
117                 responseData.heightmapUrl = responseData.texture.src;
118 
119                 var canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
120                 canvas.width = responseData.texture.width;
121                 canvas.height = responseData.texture.height;
122                 var context = canvas.getContext('2d');
123                 context.drawImage(responseData.texture, 0, 0);
124 
125                 var hm = new Array(canvas.width);
126                 for(var k=0; k<canvas.width; k++)
127                 {
128                     hm[k] = new Array(canvas.height);
129                 }
130 
131                 responseData.width = hm.length;
132                 responseData.height = hm[0].length;
133 
134                 var imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
135                 var total = 0;
136                 for(var i=3; i<imageData.data.length; i+=4)
137                 {
138                     var index = i/4;
139                     hm[parseInt(index%hm.length)][parseInt(index/hm.length)] = imageData.data[i];
140 
141                     if( responseData.minHMvalue > imageData.data[i] )
142                     { responseData.minHMvalue = imageData.data[i]  }
143                     if( responseData.maxHMvalue < imageData.data[i] )
144                     { responseData.maxHMvalue = imageData.data[i]  }
145                     total = total + parseFloat(imageData.data[i]);
146 
147                 }
148                 responseData.averageHMvalue = parseFloat(total / imageData.data.length);
149                 responseData.heightmap = hm;
150             }
151 
152             x3dom.debug.logInfo("Server request done.");
153             context = null;
154             canvas = null;
155             callback.receiveData(responseData);
156         };
157         responseData.texture.onerror = function()
158         {
159             x3dom.debug.logInfo("ServerRequest::wcpsRequest(): Could not load Image from url " + url + "! Aborted!");
160             callback.receiveData(responseData);
161         };
162 
163         responseData.textureUrl = url + "?query=" + encodeURI(query);
164         responseData.texture.src = url + "?query=" + encodeURI(query);
165     }
166     catch(error)
167     {
168         x3dom.debug.logInfo('ServerRequest::getWCPSImage(): ' + error);
169         callback.receiveData(responseData);
170     }
171 };
172 
173 /**
174  * Requests a WCS coverage and stores is the heightmap field of the responseData.
175  * @param callback - Object to do the callback.
176  * @param responseData - Instance of the ServerResponseData.
177  * @param WCSurl - URl of the WCS service.
178  * @param WCScoverID - ID of the coverage.
179  * @param WCSBoundingBox - Bounding Box of the area.
180  * @param WCSVersion - Version of used WCS service.
181  */
182 EarthServerGenericClient.getCoverageWCS = function(callback,responseData,WCSurl,WCScoverID,WCSBoundingBox,WCSVersion)
183 {
184     var request = 'service=WCS&Request=GetCoverage&version=' + WCSVersion + '&CoverageId=' + WCScoverID;
185     request += '&subsetx=x(' + WCSBoundingBox.minLatitude + ',' + WCSBoundingBox.maxLatitude + ')&subsety=y(' + WCSBoundingBox.minLongitude + ',' + WCSBoundingBox.maxLongitude + ')';
186 
187     $.ajax(
188         {
189             url: WCSurl,
190             type: 'GET',
191             dataType: 'XML',
192             data: request,
193             success: function(receivedData)
194             {
195                 var Grid = $(receivedData).find('GridEnvelope');
196                 var low  = $(Grid).find('low').text().split(" ");
197                 var high = $(Grid).find('high').text().split(" ");
198 
199                 var sizeX = high[0] - low[0] + 1;
200                 var sizeY = high[1] - low[1] + 1;
201 
202                 if( sizeX <=0 || sizeY <=0)
203                 {   throw "getCoverageWCS: "+WCSurl+"/"+WCScoverID+": Invalid grid size ("+sizeX+","+sizeY+")"; }
204 
205                 responseData.height = sizeX;
206                 responseData.width  = sizeY;
207 
208                 var hm = new Array(sizeX);
209                 for(var index=0; index<hm.length; index++)
210                 {
211                     hm[index] = new Array(sizeY);
212                 }
213 
214                 var DataBlocks = $(receivedData).find('DataBlock');
215                 DataBlocks.each(function () {
216                     var tuples = $(this).find("tupleList").text().split('},');
217                     for (var i = 0; i < tuples.length; i++) {
218                         var tmp = tuples[i].substr(1);
219                         var valuesList = tmp.split(",");
220 
221                         for (var k = 0; k < valuesList.length; k++) {
222                             tmp = parseFloat(valuesList[k]);
223 
224                             hm[parseInt(k/(sizeX))][parseInt(k%(sizeX))] = tmp;
225 
226                             if (responseData.maxHMvalue < tmp)
227                             {
228                                 responseData.maxHMvalue = parseInt(tmp);
229                             }
230                             if (responseData.minHMvalue > tmp)
231                             {
232                                 responseData.minHMvalue = parseInt(tmp);
233                             }
234                         }
235                     }
236                     if(responseData.minHMvalue!=0 && responseData.maxHMvalue!=0)
237                     {
238                         responseData.averageHMvalue = (responseData.minHMvalue+responseData.maxHMvalue)/2;
239                     }
240                     tuples = null;
241                 });
242                 DataBlocks = null;
243                 responseData.heightmap = hm;
244                 //callback.receiveData(receivedData);
245                 callback.receiveData(responseData);
246             },
247             error: function(xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError)
248             {
249                 x3dom.debug.logInfo('\t' + xhr.status +" " + ajaxOptions + " " + thrownError);
250             }
251         }
252     );
253 };
254 
255 /**
256  * Requests one image via WCSPS. It is assumed that the image has a dem encoded in the alpha channel.
257  * If not the terrain is flat.
258  * @param callback - Module that requests the image.
259  * @param WCPSurl - URL of the WCPS service.
260  * @param WCPSquery - The WCPS query.
261  */
262 EarthServerGenericClient.requestWCPSImageAlphaDem = function(callback,WCPSurl,WCPSquery)
263 {
264     var responseData = new EarthServerGenericClient.ServerResponseData();
265     EarthServerGenericClient.getWCPSImage(callback,responseData,WCPSurl,WCPSquery,true);
266 };
267 
268 /**
269  * The progressive WCPS loader initiate multiple queries consecutively. As soon as one response is received the
270  * next query is executed. Every response is given to the given callback.
271  * Note: The WCPS loader starts with the last query in the array (LIFO).
272  * @param callback - Module that requests the WCPS images.
273  * @param WCPSurl - URL of the WCPS service.
274  * @param WCPSqueries - Array of WCPS queries. (LIFO)
275  * @param DemInAlpha - Flag if a dem is encoded in the alpha channel.
276  */
277 EarthServerGenericClient.progressiveWCPSImageLoader = function(callback,WCPSurl,WCPSqueries,DemInAlpha)
278 {
279     var which = WCPSqueries.length -1;
280     //We need one responseData for every query in WCPSqueries
281     var responseData = [];
282     //For time logging.
283     this.name = "Progressive WCPS Loader: " + callback.name;
284 
285     for(var i=0;i<WCPSqueries.length;i++)
286     {   responseData[i] = new EarthServerGenericClient.ServerResponseData();    }
287 
288     this.makeRequest =  function(which)
289     {
290         if(which >= 0)
291         {
292             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("Progressive WCPS: " + WCPSurl + "_Query_" +which);
293             EarthServerGenericClient.getWCPSImage(this,responseData[which],WCPSurl,WCPSqueries[which],DemInAlpha);
294         }
295         else
296         {   responseData = null;  }
297     };
298     this.receiveData = function(data)
299     {
300         EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Progressive WCPS: " + WCPSurl + "_Query_" +which);
301         which--;
302         this.makeRequest(which);
303         callback.receiveData(data);
304     };
305     this.makeRequest(which);
306 };
307 
308 /**
309  * Requets an image via WCPS and a dem via WCS.
310  * @param callback - Module requesting this data.
311  * @param WCPSurl - URL of the WCPS service.
312  * @param WCPSquery - WCPS Query for the image.
313  * @param WCSurl - URL of the WCS service.
314  * @param WCScoverID - Coverage ID for the WCS height data.
315  * @param WCSBoundingBox - Bounding box of the area used in WCS.
316  * @param WCSVersion - Version of the used WCS.
317  */
318 EarthServerGenericClient.requestWCPSImageWCSDem = function(callback,WCPSurl,WCPSquery,WCSurl,WCScoverID,WCSBoundingBox,WCSVersion)
319 {
320     var responseData = new EarthServerGenericClient.ServerResponseData();
321     var combine = new EarthServerGenericClient.combinedCallBack(callback,2);
322 
323     EarthServerGenericClient.getWCPSImage(combine,responseData,WCPSurl,WCPSquery,false);
324     EarthServerGenericClient.getCoverageWCS(combine,responseData,WCSurl,WCScoverID,WCSBoundingBox,WCSVersion);
325 };
326 
327 /**
328  * Requests an image via WMS and a dem via WCS.
329  * @param callback - Module requesting this data.
330  * @param BoundingBox - Bounding box of the area, used in both WMS and WCS requests.
331  * @param ResX - Width of the response image via WMS.
332  * @param ResY - Height of the response image via WMS.
333  * @param WMSurl - URL of the WMS service.
334  * @param WMScoverID - Layer ID used in WMS.
335  * @param WMSversion - Version of the WMS service.
336  * @param WMSCRS - The Coordinate Reference System. (Should be like: "crs=1")
337  * @param WMSImageFormat - Image format for the WMS response.
338  * @param WCSurl - URL of the WCS service.
339  * @param WCScoverID - Coverage ID used in WCS.
340  * @param WCSVersion - Version of the WCS service.
341  */
342 EarthServerGenericClient.requestWMSImageWCSDem = function(callback,BoundingBox,ResX,ResY,WMSurl,WMScoverID,WMSversion,WMSCRS,WMSImageFormat,WCSurl,WCScoverID,WCSVersion)
343 {
344     var responseData = new EarthServerGenericClient.ServerResponseData();
345     var combine = new EarthServerGenericClient.combinedCallBack(callback,2);
346 
347     EarthServerGenericClient.getCoverageWMS(combine,responseData,WMSurl,WMScoverID,WMSCRS,WMSImageFormat,BoundingBox,WMSversion,ResX,ResY);
348     EarthServerGenericClient.getCoverageWCS(combine,responseData,WCSurl,WCScoverID,BoundingBox,WCSVersion);
349 };
